instruction.name: The measure of the business criticality of an incident based on business needs.
The extent to which the incident leads to distortion of expected service levels.
Set this flag to override the system's default priority.
Based on impact and urgency, the order in which incidents should be resolved.
Updating this field will update all contact fields.
